overview: The urban white-collar Richard is a man with high self-esteem. He is well-dressed and well-mannered, and he never leaves his briefcase in his daily life. He has extremely picky and even harsh requirements for his future partner, who must be beautiful and virtuous. There are hundreds of girls whom Richard had met, but none of them could fall into his eyes. On this day, Richard was scolded by his boss. He was indifferent and suddenly received a strange text message. The text message introduced him to a mysterious APP. As long as he entered what he wanted, his dream would come true. After a little experimentation, Richard confirmed the authenticity of the app, so he typed in the words "let a love come". Has the perfect love he hoped for here come?
title: Richard's Perfect Lover
